Html:
Hello,


You seem more oriented toward WinForms so I was wondering if there are less functionnalities for the WPF version than the WinForms one ?

I am considering GMap for a project, and rather use WPF, as I have no experience in WinForms.

 

Thank you,

 

JMN
the biggest difference is in markers, in wpf its UIelements, but on windows forms they are rendered manually, ...and i try to support both versions ;}
